criterion: The note does not mention the patient's living arrangement or caregiver help.
The vital signs are not recorded in a standard format.
The note does not mention any relevant medical history.
The note provides a clear and concise summary of the patient's condition.
The note does not include a plan for further treatment or follow-up.
The note includes relevant information about the patient's medications.
The note does not mention any relevant social or environmental factors.
The note is easy to understand and written in a clear and concise manner.
The note does not include a review of the patient's systems.
The note includes relevant information about the patient's allergies.
The note does not provide a clear and concise summary of the patient's diagnosis.
The note includes relevant information about the patient's medical history.
The note does not mention any relevant laboratory or imaging results.
The note is well-organized and easy to follow.
The note does not include a plan for further testing or evaluation.
The note includes relevant information about the patient's family medical history.
The note does not provide a clear and concise summary of the patient's treatment plan.
